column5: It was a pretty good salmon run.     I caught almost all my salmon this summer on Green/Chartreuse 3 1/2 Inch Buzzbombs.  The new board looks really great by the way.  Happy Holidays to everyone.
Nice fish man!  You live in the Sault?
Home of the Greyhounds......nice fish, Kinger!
Nice fish, I've been to the Soo a couple of times but never fished while I was there.  Mike
Nice Salmon, now you got to get out for those huge St Mary's pike
Hey, you using the buzzbombs off the boardwalk by the mall?

Please forgive my ignorance (just getting back into fishing) but I am curious what a Buzzbomb is...the only Buzzbombs I know are a rockabilly band and I am fairly certian that you are not using them for bait??  blyght
popular for salmon in the Sault http://www.buzzbombzzinger.com/
Thanks guys!  Really appreciate it..I didn't have any luck looking them up but then it helps when you sort of know what you are looking for!  blyght
